channel.name: Intergy_outbound_DFT_Gensys_Dev

properties.select: select CNAD.CaseNumberDFTDetailID,CNAD.CaseNumberDetailID,MessageControlID,REPLACE(MessageControlID,'glm_','') AS MessageID, FORMAT(CNAD.CreatedDate,'yyyyMMddhhmmss') AS CreatedDate,MessageStatus,CND.CaseNumber from CaseNumberDFTDetail CNAD INNER JOIN dbo.CaseNumberDetail CND ON CNAD.CaseNumberDetailID=CND.CaseNumberDetailID where MessageStatus = 'New' AND CND.IsPrimarius=0 order by CNAD.CreatedDate asc

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Call Stored procedure to fetch patient detials
Construct MSH Segment
Construct EVN Segment
Construct PID and PV1 segment
Fetch FT1 and PR1 Result set
Construct GT1 and IN1 Segment
Construct ACC segment

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
